Public Class methods

copy(source, differences = {})

makes a copy of source and copies the polymorphic associated essence

[Source]

    # File app/models/content.rb, line 60
60:   def self.copy(source, differences = {})
61:     differences[:position] = nil
62:     differences[:id] = nil
63:     attributes = source.attributes.merge(differences)
64:     content = self.create!(attributes.except("id"))
65:     new_essence = content.essence.clone
66:     new_essence.save
67:     content.essence_id = new_essence.id
68:     content
69:   end
create_from_scratch(element, essences_hash, options = {})

Creates a new Content as descriped in the elements.yml file

[Source]

    # File app/models/content.rb, line 15
15:   def self.create_from_scratch(element, essences_hash, options = {})
16:     options = {:created_from_element => false}.merge(options)
17:     if essences_hash[:name].blank? && !essences_hash[:essence_type].blank?
18:       essences_of_same_type = element.contents.find_all_by_essence_type(essences_hash[:essence_type])
19:       description = {
20:         'type' => essences_hash[:essence_type],
21:         'name' => "#{essences_hash[:essence_type].underscore}_#{essences_of_same_type.length + 1}"
22:       }
23:     else
24:       description = Content.description_for(
25:         element,
26:         essences_hash[:name],
27:         :from_available_essences => !options[:created_from_element]
28:       )
29:     end
30:     raise "No description found in elements.yml for #{essences_hash.inspect} and #{element.inspect}" if description.blank?
31:     essence_class = ObjectSpace.const_get(description['type'])
32:     content = self.new(:name => description['name'], :element_id => element.id)
33:     if description['type'] == "EssenceRichtext" || description['type'] == "EssenceText"
34:       essence = essence_class.create(:do_not_index => !description['do_not_index'].nil?)
35:     else
36:       essence = essence_class.create
37:     end
38:     if essence
39:       content.essence = essence
40:       content.save
41:     else
42:       content = nil
43:     end
44:     return content
45:   end

settings()

Settings from the elements.yml definition

[Source]

    # File app/models/content.rb, line 48
48:   def settings()
49:     description = my_description()
50:     if description.blank?
51:       description = my_description(:from_available_essences => true)
52:     end
53:     return {} if description.blank?
54:     settings = description['settings']
55:     return {} if settings.blank?
56:     settings.symbolize_keys
57:   end
